title: can't see rune page, masteries
body:
i can't see the runepage to change my runes or masteries, and in the game lobby i can't see my teammates summoner spells. and the images in the masteries page in the game lobby are pink.

i tried restarting my client and pc.

do i have to reinstall?

replies.body: Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to top right of the patcher. Hit Repair and let it scan and repair all the game files, you'll see the "Launch" button when it's done.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ittEFwnG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-17T07:53:33.453+0000)
>
> Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to top right of the patcher. Hit Repair and let it scan and repair all the game files, you'll see the "Launch" button when it's done.

It worked! thank you!
Welcomed have fun Rune sorting and battling on the Fields of Justice. :)
Same Problem Bro, but i can tell you, reinstalling doesnt fix it....
The issue you experienced may be due to a few reasons such as corrupt files or even a connection issue to the servers.  I'm glad Rineyy's solution was able to get this fixed up for you!
